Lowell.Monarch Diner:
The Monarch Diner, now the Owl Diner, is a historic diner at 246 Appleton Street in Lowell, Massachusetts.
The diner was built by Worcester Lunch Car Company as #749 in 1940, and was originally located in Waltham, Massachusetts, where it operated as the Monarch Diner. In 1951 the diner was moved to its present location in Lowell.
